actionCalls.description: Send email using the email to fax.
actionCalls.name: Fax_Informed_Consent
actionCalls.label: Fax Informed Consent

actionCalls.description: Create a task for the email sent to client when kit shipped.
actionCalls.name: Log_Task_to_Lab_for_Shipped_Email
actionCalls.label: Log Task to Lab for Shipped Email

value.stringValue: Email Sent To Client For Kit Shipped

actionCalls.description: Call email alert and send email to client when kit shipped.
actionCalls.name: Send_Client_Email_When_Shipped
actionCalls.label: Send Client Email When Shipped

actionCalls.description: Send email alert to cs team notifying about due date in 3 days.
actionCalls.name: Send_CS_Email_About_Due_Date_In_3_Days
actionCalls.label: Send CS Email About Due Date In 3 Days

actionCalls.description: Send the email for the missing kit - 24.
actionCalls.name: Send_Email_Kit_Not_At_Lab_24
actionCalls.label: Send Email - Kit Not At Lab - 24

actionCalls.description: Send the email for the missing kit - 36.
actionCalls.name: Send_Email_Kit_Not_At_Lab_36
actionCalls.label: Send Email - Kit Not At Lab - 36

actionCalls.description: Send the email for the missing kit - 48.
actionCalls.name: Send_Email_Kit_Not_At_Lab_48
actionCalls.label: Send Email - Kit Not At Lab - 48

actionCalls.description: Call the email alert to send Allied notification of Saturday delivery.
actionCalls.name: Send_Email_To_Allied_For_Saturday_Delivery
actionCalls.label: Send Email To Allied For Saturday Delivery

actionCalls.description: Send email to mother when collection kit at lab.
actionCalls.name: Send_Email_To_Mother_When_Kit_At_Lab
actionCalls.label: Send Email To Mother When Kit At Lab

actionCalls.description: Call email alert to send second signer agreement.
actionCalls.name: Send_Second_Signer_Agreement
actionCalls.label: Send Second Signer Agreement

actionCalls.description: Send email with access to portal.
actionCalls.name: Send_Surrogate_Portal_Email
actionCalls.label: Send Surrogate Portal Email

decisions.description: Check to see if the due date changed on the lab.
decisions.name: Did_Baby_Due_Date_Change
decisions.label: Did Baby Due Date Change?
decisions.defaultConnectorLabel: NO - No Change Baby Due Date

decisions.description: Determine if fulfillment info changed.
decisions.name: Did_Fulfillment_Info_Change
decisions.label: Did Fulfillment Info Change

rules.name: YES_Fulfillment_Changed_Twins
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 or 3 or 4 or 5 or 6 or 7)
rules.label: YES - Fulfillment Changed - Twins

rules.name: YES_Fulfillment_Changed_Triplets
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 or 3 or 4 or 5 or 6 or 7 or 8 or 9 or 10)
rules.label: YES - Fulfillment Changed - Triplets

decisions.description: Check to see if parent names changed.
decisions.name: Did_Parent_Names_Change
decisions.label: Did Parent Names Change?

decisions.description: Check to see if the surrogate info has changed.
decisions.name: Did_Surrogate_Info_Change
decisions.label: Did Surrogate Info Change?

decisions.description: Check to see if using surrogate and shipping info changed.
decisions.name: Did_Surrogate_Shipping_Change
decisions.label: Did Surrogate Shipping Change

rules.name: YES_Surrogate_Shipping_Info_Changed
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7)
rules.label: YES - Surrogate Shipping Info Changed

decisions.description: Determine if we found a surrogate record already.
decisions.name: Does_Surrogate_Already_Exists
decisions.label: Does Surrogate Already Exists

decisions.description: Determine if contact1 values have changed.
decisions.name: Has_Contact1_Values_Changed
decisions.label: Has Contact1 Values Changed

decisions.description: Determine if the kit has shipped.
decisions.name: Has_Kit_Shipped
decisions.label: Has Kit Shipped

decisions.description: Check to see if contact 2 has changed
decisions.name: Has_Lab_Contact_2_Changed
decisions.label: Has Lab Contact 2 Changed

decisions.description: Check to see if AC checked and we have an incomplete child name
decisions.name: Is_AC_Checked_And_Incomplete_Child_Name
decisions.label: Is AC Checked And Incomplete Child Name
decisions.defaultConnectorLabel: NO - AC Not Complete Or Name Complete

decisions.description: Check to see if baby due in 3 days and need new shipping.
decisions.name: Is_Baby_Due_In_3_Days
decisions.label: Is Baby Due In 3 Days
decisions.defaultConnectorLabel: NO - Baby Not Due In 3 Days

decisions.description: Check to see if the birth date from courier has been entered.
decisions.name: Is_Birth_Date_Entered
decisions.label: Is Birth Date Entered

rules.name: YES_Birth_Date_From_Courier_Entered
rules.label: YES - Birth Date From Courier Entered

decisions.description: Determine if the collection is at the lab.
decisions.name: Is_Collection_At_Lab
decisions.label: Is Collection At Lab

decisions.description: Determine if collection kit is at lab.
decisions.name: Is_Collection_Kit_At_Lab
decisions.label: Is Collection Kit At Lab
decisions.defaultConnectorLabel: NO - Collection Kit Not At Lab

decisions.description: Check to see if collection kit is on hold
decisions.name: Is_Collection_Kit_Status_On_Hold
decisions.label: Is Collection Kit Status On Hold

decisions.description: Check to see if contact1 (mother/primary) has been populated.
decisions.name: Is_Contact1_Populated
decisions.label: Is Contact1 Populated

decisions.description: Validate that the contact first name is populated and shipment first name is not.
decisions.name: Is_Contact_First_Name_Set_And_Ship_First_Name_is_Null
decisions.label: Is Contact First Name Set And Ship First Name is Null

rules.name: First_Name_Set_and_Ship_First_Name_Not
rules.label: First Name Set and Ship First Name Not

decisions.description: Check to see if the DCS is complete.
decisions.name: Is_DCS_Complete_24Hr_Check
decisions.label: Is DCS Complete - 24Hr Check
decisions.defaultConnectorLabel: YES - DCS Complete or not born

rules.name: NO_Not_Complete_at_24_hour_check
rules.label: NO - Not Complete at 24 hour check

decisions.description: Check to see if the DCS is complete.
decisions.name: Is_DCS_Complete_36Hr_Check
decisions.label: Is DCS Complete - 36Hr Check
decisions.defaultConnectorLabel: YES - DCS Complete or not born

rules.name: NO_Not_Complete_at_36_hour_check
rules.label: NO - Not Complete at 36 hour check

decisions.description: Check to see if the DCS is complete.
decisions.name: Is_DCS_Complete_48Hr_Check
decisions.label: Is DCS Complete - 48Hr Check
decisions.defaultConnectorLabel: YES - DCS Complete or not born

rules.name: NO_Not_Complete_at_48_hour_check
rules.label: NO - Not Complete at 48 hour check

decisions.description: Check to see if docusign step is completed for fax.
decisions.name: Is_Docusign_Completed_for_Fax
decisions.label: Is Docusign Completed for Fax

decisions.description: Check to see if same day ship.
decisions.name: Is_Kit_Already_Shipped
decisions.label: Is Kit Already Shipped

decisions.description: Check to see if kit sent from NYC lab.
decisions.name: Is_Kit_Sent_From_NYC_Lab
decisions.label: Is Kit Sent From NYC Lab

decisions.description: Check to see if maternal blood draw is required.
decisions.name: Is_Maternal_Blood_Draw_Required
decisions.label: Is Maternal Blood Draw Required
decisions.defaultConnectorLabel: NO - Maternal Blood Draw Not Req

decisions.description: Check to see if maternal blood redraw flag is set.
decisions.name: Is_Maternal_Blood_Redraw_Set_On_Lab
decisions.label: Is Maternal Blood Redraw Set On Lab

decisions.description: Check to see if the same day status is set to picked up.
decisions.name: Is_Same_Day_Status_Picked_Up
decisions.label: Is Same Day Status Picked Up
decisions.defaultConnectorLabel: NO - Same Day Not Picked Up

rules.name: YES_Same_Day_Set_To_Picked_Up
rules.label: YES - Same Day Set To Picked Up

decisions.description: Check to see if second signer is complete with welcome packet.
decisions.name: Is_Second_Signer_Packet_Complete
decisions.label: Is Second Signer Packet Complete
decisions.defaultConnectorLabel: NO - Second Signer Packet Not Complete

decisions.description: Determine if second signer is selected.
decisions.name: Is_Second_Signer_Selected
decisions.label: Is Second Signer Selected

decisions.description: Determine if second signer wp is incomplete.
decisions.name: Is_Second_Signer_WP_Incomplete
decisions.label: Is Second Signer WP Incomplete

rules.name: YES_Second_Signer_WP_incomplete
rules.conditionLogic: 1 and (2 or 3 or 4 or 5 or 6 or 7)
rules.label: YES - Second Signer WP incomplete

decisions.description: Check to see if this lab has a surrogate.
decisions.name: Is_There_A_Surrogate
decisions.label: Is There A Surrogate

decisions.description: Determine if this is a Saturday delivery.
decisions.name: Is_This_A_Saturday_Delivery
decisions.label: Is This A Saturday Delivery?

decisions.description: Check if welcome pack values are complete.
decisions.name: Is_Welcome_Pack_Complete
decisions.label: Is Welcome Pack Complete

decisions.description: Check to see if the welcome packet is complete for surrogate.
decisions.name: Is_Welcome_Pack_Complete_Surrogate
decisions.label: Is Welcome Pack Complete - Surrogate
decisions.defaultConnectorLabel: NO - Welcome Pack Not Complete Surrogate

decisions.description: Check to see if WP is incomplete
decisions.name: Is_WP_Incomplete
decisions.label: Is WP Incomplete

decisions.description: Check to see if Your Healthcare Team is completed.
decisions.name: Is_Your_Healthcare_Team_Completed
decisions.label: Is Your Healthcare Team Completed

decisions.description: Determine if we are using the fax or email
decisions.name: Using_Fax_or_Email
decisions.label: Using Fax or Email

Flow.description: Main flow for the lab record after insert or update.

formulas.description: Formula for date three days from today.
formulas.name: formDTThreeDaysFromToday

formulas.description: Formula that will combine the contact phone numbers.
formulas.name: formTCombinedContactPhones
formulas.expression: SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Mother_s_Phone__c}, "(", ""), ")", ""), " ", ""), "-", "")&" "& SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Father_s_Phone__c}, "(", ""), ")", ""), " ", ""), "-", "")

formulas.description: Formula that will combine the email addresses for contacts.
formulas.name: formTCombinedEmailAddresses

formulas.description: Formula will build the full name of father from fname and lname.
formulas.name: formTFathersFullName

formulas.description: This is the formula that will provide the fax email.
formulas.name: formTFaxEmail
formulas.expression: if(BEGINS({!$Record.OBGYN_Fax__c}, "1"), SUBSTITUTE (SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE (SUBSTITUTE ({!$Record.OBGYN_Fax__c} , "(", null), ")", null), "-", null), " ", null)&"@send.myfax.com", "1"&SUBSTITUTE (SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE (SUBSTITUTE ({!$Record.OBGYN_Fax__c} , "(", null), ")", null), "-", null), " ", null)&"@send.myfax.com")

formulas.description: Formula that builds full name from fname and lname.
formulas.name: formTMothersFullName

formulas.description: Formula for shipping method off hold.
formulas.name: formTShippingMethodOffHold

formulas.description: Formula that will string the surrogate name for the lab name.
formulas.name: formTSurrogateLabName

Flow.label: RecordTrigger:Lab After Insert or Update

recordCreates.description: Create the contact record for the surrogate.
recordCreates.name: Create_Surrogate_Contact
recordCreates.label: Create Surrogate Contact

recordLookups.description: This get will look for a surrogate contact that already exists.
recordLookups.name: Get_Surrogate_To_See_If_Exists
recordLookups.label: Get Surrogate To See If Exists

recordUpdates.description: Update the triggering record and set faxed consent to true
recordUpdates.name: Set_Faxed_Consent_True
recordUpdates.label: Set Faxed Consent True

recordUpdates.description: Update the related account's combined phone and email fields for contact1.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Account_Combined_Phone_and_Email_Fields_Contact_1
recordUpdates.label: Update Account Combined Phone and Email Fields - Contact 1

recordUpdates.description: Update the related account's combined phone and email fields for contact2.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Account_Combined_Phone_and_Email_Fields_Contact_2
recordUpdates.label: Update Account Combined Phone and Email Fields - Contact 2

recordUpdates.description: Update the baby records for changes on parent names.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Baby_For_Name_Changes
recordUpdates.label: Update Baby For Name Changes

recordUpdates.description: Update the associated cord blood order and set status to incomplete.
recordUpdates.name: Update_CBO_For_WP_Incomplete
recordUpdates.label: Update CBO For WP Incomplete

recordUpdates.description: Update Collection At Lab value.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Collection_At_Lab
recordUpdates.label: Update Collection At Lab

recordUpdates.description: Update the Contact's baby due date.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Contact_For_Due_Date
recordUpdates.label: Update Contact For Due Date

recordUpdates.description: Update the assoc cord blood record and set welcome packet complete.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Cord_Blood_for_Welcome_Pack_Complete
recordUpdates.label: Update Cord Blood for Welcome Pack Complete

recordUpdates.description: Update the related cord blood order due date.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Cord_Blood_Order_Due_Date
recordUpdates.label: Update Cord Blood Order Due Date

recordUpdates.description: Update email for fax using fax.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Email_for_Fax
recordUpdates.label: Update Email for Fax

recordUpdates.description: Update Kit Sent
recordUpdates.name: Update_Kit_Sent
recordUpdates.label: Update Kit Sent

recordUpdates.description: Update Lab record
recordUpdates.name: Update_Lab
recordUpdates.label: Update Lab

recordUpdates.description: Update the lab collection kit status for already sent.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Lab_Collection_Kit_Status
recordUpdates.label: Update Lab Collection Kit Status

recordUpdates.description: Update the triggering lab record for email sent.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Lab_for_Collection_Email_Sent
recordUpdates.label: Update Lab for Collection Email Sent

recordUpdates.description: Update the lab record and set the status to completed.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Lab_For_Completed_Welcome_Pack
recordUpdates.label: Update Lab For Completed Welcome Pack

recordUpdates.description: Update the lab for incomplete child name.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Lab_for_Incomplete_Child_Name
recordUpdates.label: Update Lab for Incomplete Child Name

recordUpdates.description: Update lab and set MBD Request Datetime
recordUpdates.name: Update_Lab_For_MBD_Request_Datetime
recordUpdates.label: Update Lab For MBD Request Datetime

recordUpdates.description: Update the lab record kit sent to true.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Lab_Kit_Sent_To_True
recordUpdates.label: Update Lab Kit Sent To True

recordUpdates.description: Update the triggering record and set kit type.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Lab_Kit_Type_for_Redraw
recordUpdates.label: Update Lab Kit Type for Redraw

recordUpdates.description: Update the lab name if using a surrogate.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Lab_Name_For_Surrogate
recordUpdates.label: Update Lab Name For Surrogate

recordUpdates.description: Update lab record for birth date and time.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Lab_With_Birthdate_Time
recordUpdates.label: Update Lab With Birthdate/Time

recordUpdates.description: Update the lab's surrogate contact field.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Lab_with_Existing_Surrogate_Contact
recordUpdates.label: Update Lab with Existing Surrogate Contact

recordUpdates.description: Update the lab's surrogate contact field.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Lab_with_Surrogate_Contact
recordUpdates.label: Update Lab with Surrogate Contact

recordUpdates.description: Update the birth date field on the opportunity when populated.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Opportunity_Birth_Date
recordUpdates.label: Update Opportunity Birth Date

recordUpdates.description: Set record to off hold.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Record_Off_Hold
recordUpdates.label: Update Record Off Hold

recordUpdates.name: Update_Ship_First_Name_and_Last_Name
recordUpdates.label: Update Ship First Name and Last Name

recordUpdates.description: Update the triggering record for surrogate shipping changes.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Shipping_For_Surrogate_Changes
recordUpdates.label: Update Shipping For Surrogate Changes

recordUpdates.description: Update the surrogate contact.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Surrogate_Contact
recordUpdates.label: Update Surrogate Contact

recordUpdates.description: Update the triggering record and set the values to incomplete.
recordUpdates.name: Update_WP_Status_To_Incomplete
recordUpdates.label: Update WP Status To Incomplete

subflows.description: Call subflow to update contact1 with changed values.
subflows.name: Call_Subflow_Update_Contact1_Values
subflows.label: Call Subflow - Update Contact1 Values

subflows.name: Create_Port_Authentication_for_Contact_using_Subflow
